body_content.explanation: an organization, especially a business, or a difficult and important plan, especially one that will earn money:
examples: Don't forget this is a commercial enterprise - we're here to make money.
Those were the years of private enterprise (= businesses being run privately, rather than by the government), when lots of small businesses were started.
Her latest enterprise (= plan) is to climb Mount Everest.

body_content.explanation: eagerness to do something new and clever, despite any risks:
examples: They've shown a lot of enterprise in setting up this project.
We need someone with enterprise and imagination to design a marketing strategy.
